whether it's like acting or like retail

number of people who are individual
contributors and then like management
and it's usually very flat uh in Tech we
have a structure that has a very deep
and Tall management uh hierarchy and
also a very tall individual contributor

all the time and have like the same

but get to be in the Union uh but
low-level managers who are like the
first level line manager wouldn't be

don't have pretty much any influence
over what manag as a whole does um
because that's the dividing line in
Union structures of today of like if
you're in management you're not in the
union if you're not in management you
get to be in the union so in order for
unions to work in Tech we would either
have to completely change the
organizational structure of tech
companies to make them flatter or we

who does not get to be in the union and
I think that would be very difficult for
how things are now because you'd have to
